wikipedia_page.main: Robert Selby Armitage,  (28 March 1905 – 26 May 1982), sometimes known as Robert Selby, won both the George Cross and George Medal for his bomb disposal work during the Second World War, one of only eight people to have been awarded both.

response: *Robert Armitage (politician) (1866–1944), British Member of Parliament for Leeds Central
*Robert Armitage (Royal Navy officer) (1905–1982), British bomb disposal expert and George Cross recipient
:— Robert Armitage, , Royal Navy officer (26 May 1982), prior to shooting and slightly wounding his wife and then killing himself
